snippet: An all-star tribute to Julius Rudel, the music director who helped build New York City Opera and led it during its glory years, is set for March.
abstract: An all-star tribute to Julius Rudel, the music director who helped build New York City Opera and led it during its glory years, is set for March.

headline.main: Tribute to Julius Rudel Aims to Aid City Opera Revival
headline.print_headline: Julius Rudel Tribute Aims to Aid City Opera Revival
